data.comment: The match is underway at De Kuip.
Vaclav Cerny scores to make it 0-1 at De Kuip.
In the minute 2, Great play from Danilo to set up the goal.
Enschede's Ramiz Zerrouki has been booked in Rotterdam.
At De Kuip, Bryan Linssen has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Feyenoord have been awarded a penalty...
In the minute 28, Jayden Oosterwolde (Enschede) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Pol van Boekel awards Feyenoord a penalty but Steven Berghuis misses from 12 yards.
In the minute 29, An attacking Feyenoord player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
Steven Berghuis scores from the spot to level the match at 1-1.
Eric Botteghin (Feyenoord) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Bart Nieuwkoop.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over.
The second-half is now underway.
Marcos Senesi is booked for the home team.
In the minute 64, Enschede make their first substitution with Alexander Jeremejeff replacing Danilo.
Lindon Selahi is replacing Ramiz Zerrouki for the away team.
The home team replace Bryan Linssen with Luciano Narsingh.
In the minute 71, Lazaros Lamprou is on a sub for Queensy Menig for Enschede.
Dick Advocaat is making the team's third substitution at De Kuip with Robert Bozenik replacing Nicolai Jorgensen.
The home team have replaced Lutsharel Geertruida with Joao Carlos Teixeira. This is the fourth substitution made today by Dick Advocaat.
In the minute 78, Nathan Markelo is replacing Tyronne Ebuehi for Enschede at De Kuip.
The away team replace Vaclav Cerny with Leeuwen Thijs Van.
The match is over. Final score 1-1.
